divs: Sighting Details I was walking my dog on March 7, 2013 around 8:45pm and I noticed a bright red-orange circle with white lights on the bottom. I thought it was a helicopter but no flashing lights and no sound. I kept walking and maybe 20 seconds later another red-orange circle appeared, then another one and another one. Im not sure if there were 5 or 6 because I was fumbling with my phone calling people to tell them to go out and look and then I tried to get some pictures. The lights all started in the same spot, were moving at a rather slow speed, equidistant and in a slightly curved line. My husband said the last one stopped and hovered for a while. I started thinking thats really weird, it didnt look like the usual stuff you see in the night sky. I watched as the lights followed each other and then they were gone.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Citrus Heights
There was one other sighting in Citrus Heights on or around March 7th 2013
Summary: 5-6 bright red-orange lights moving in slowish, equidistant, straightish line in the evening sky over Citrus Heights
